DOC.brief_summary: The study compares the adherence of 240 HIV-negative subjects randomly assigned to 2 different antiretroviral therapies for 28 days after accidental exposure to HIV.
DOC.brief_title: Atazanavir or Lopinavir in HIV Post-exposure Prophylaxis
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 HIV exposure requiring prophylaxis under current guidelines Pregnancy Suspected drug resistance in source case Contraindications to the study drugs
